14#pragma once
15
16#include <stdlib.h>
17
18#include <isc/lang.h>
19
20/*! \file isc/nonce.h
21 * \brief Provides a function for generating an arbitrarily long nonce.
22 */
23
24ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
25
26void
27isc_nonce_buf(void *buf, size_t buflen);
28/*!<
29 * Fill 'buf', up to 'buflen' bytes, with random data from the
30 * crypto provider's random function.
31 */
32
33ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
